nodes.title: Playing Around with Eleventy
nodes.excerpt: Eleventy - yet another static site generator So I've been toying with the idea of creating a web app for an NFL pool that I'm in.  The guy…
nodes.description: Taking a stab at another static site generator.  Eleventy (11ty) was a refreshingly simple SSG that was up and running in a couple days.

nodes.title: Zero to TypeScript in ... I'll let you know when it's done.
nodes.excerpt: I know what you're thinking... Well let me tell you, I've never been the biggest fan of JavaScript! If you're still reading, let me explain…
nodes.description: So I've been disliking Javascript for a while now, I won't lie - but I understand necessity.  Looks like it's time to give Typescript a go and try to make the best of it.  Enjoy my suffering.
